# Hello!

In February I will participate in a meetup of the [R-Ladies](http://rladies.org/) chapter [R-Ladies Resistencia-Corrientes](https://twitter.com/RLadies_rciacte) and the R user group [R en el NEA](https : //renelnea.github.io/web/). These groups represent the R users of Resistencia and Corrientes cities of Argentina.

The meetup consists of a workshop where attendees will learn to build their own apps. This material improves the one that I presented in an [R-Ladies Buenos Aires](https://twitter.com/RLadiesBA) meetup in 2017.
